description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的国家，是世界上唯一以犹太人为主体民族的国家。
description.en: A country in Western Asia, it is the world's only Jewish-majority state.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家，曾多次担任以色列总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician who has served multiple terms as Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家，现任以色列总统。
description.en: An Israeli politician currently serving as the President of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列首任总理，被誉为“以色列国父”。
description.en: The first Prime Minister of Israel, regarded as the 'founding father of Israel'.

description.zh-cn: 宣告以色列国正式成立的文件。
description.en: The document that formally declared the establishment of the State of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 一项政治运动，主张在以色列地建立一个属于犹太民族的家园。
description.en: A political movement that advocates for the establishment of a homeland for the Jewish people in the Land of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 现代政治锡安主义的创始人。
description.en: The founder of modern political Zionism.

en: United Nations Partition Plan for Palestine

description.zh-cn: 联合国大会通过的关于巴勒斯坦托管地未来治理的决议，建议将其划分为一个犹太国家和一个阿拉伯国家。
description.en: A resolution passed by the UN General Assembly regarding the future governance of Mandatory Palestine, recommending its partition into a Jewish state and an Arab state.

description.zh-cn: 一个由主权国家组成的国际组织。
description.en: An intergovernmental organization composed of sovereign states.

description.zh-cn: 一个由阿拉伯国家组成的区域性国际组织。
description.en: A regional international organization of Arab states.

description.zh-cn: 以色列建国后，与其邻近的阿拉伯国家之间爆发的第一场大规模战争。
description.en: The first large-scale war fought between the newly established State of Israel and its neighboring Arab states.

description.zh-cn: 位于北非和西亚的国家。
description.en: A country located in North Africa and Western Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的国家。
description.en: A country in Western Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的国家。
description.en: A country in Western Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的国家。
description.en: A country in Western Asia.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的国家。
description.en: A country in Western Asia.

description.zh-cn: 1967年6月以色列与其邻国埃及、叙利亚和约旦之间爆发的战争。战后以色列占领了约旦河西岸、加沙地带、戈兰高地和西奈半岛。
description.en: A war fought in June 1967 between Israel and its neighbors Egypt, Syria, and Jordan. After the war, Israel occupied the West Bank, Gaza Strip, Golan Heights, and Sinai Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的内陆地区，是巴勒斯坦领土的一部分。
description.en: A landlocked territory in Western Asia, part of the Palestinian territories.

description.zh-cn: 位于地中海沿岸的巴勒斯坦飞地。
description.en: A Palestinian exclave on the coast of the Mediterranean Sea.

description.zh-cn: 位于西亚的岩石高原，国际上普遍认为是叙利亚领土，但自1967年以来被以色列占领。
description.en: A rocky plateau in Western Asia, internationally recognized as Syrian territory but occupied by Israel since 1967.

description.zh-cn: 埃及的半岛，位于亚洲和非洲之间。
description.en: A peninsula in Egypt, situated between Asia and Africa.

description.zh-cn: 1973年10月，由埃及和叙利亚领导的阿拉伯国家联盟对以色列发动的战争。
description.en: A war initiated in October 1973 by a coalition of Arab states led by Egypt and Syria against Israel.

description.zh-cn: 位于北美的国家。
description.en: A country in North America.

description.zh-cn: 埃及总统萨达特和以色列总理贝京在美国总统卡特斡旋下签署的协议，为1979年的埃以和平条约奠定了基础。
description.en: Agreements signed by Egyptian President Anwar Sadat and Israeli Prime Minister Menachem Begin, brokered by US President Jimmy Carter, which led to the 1979 Egypt–Israel peace treaty.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家，利库德集团创始人，曾任以色列第六任总理。
description.en: An Israeli politician, founder of Likud, and the sixth Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 埃及政治家，曾任埃及第三任总统。
description.en: An Egyptian politician who served as the third President of Egypt.

description.zh-cn: 以色列与埃及签署的和平条约，结束了两国长达三十年的敌对状态。
description.en: A peace treaty signed between Israel and Egypt, ending three decades of hostility between the two countries.

description.zh-cn: 以色列政治家和将军，曾两度担任以色列总理，因推动以巴和平进程获诺贝尔和平奖，后被刺杀。
description.en: An Israeli politician and general, who served two terms as Prime Minister of Israel, won the Nobel Peace Prize for his role in the peace process, and was later assassinated.

description.zh-cn: 以色列与巴勒斯坦解放组织签署的一系列协议，旨在解决以巴冲突。
description.en: A set of agreements between Israel and the Palestine Liberation Organization aimed at resolving the Israeli–Palestinian conflict.

description.zh-cn: 一个旨在代表巴勒斯坦人民的政治和准军事组织。
description.en: A political and paramilitary organization founded to represent the Palestinian people.

description.zh-cn: 一名以色列极右翼激进分子，因刺杀以色列总理伊扎克·拉宾而闻名。
description.en: An Israeli far-right extremist known for assassinating Israeli Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin.

description.zh-cn: 巴勒斯坦伊斯兰逊尼派准军事组织。
description.en: A Palestinian Sunni-Islamist fundamentalist, militant, and nationalist organization.

description.zh-cn: 始于2023年10月7日的一场武装冲突，由哈马斯对以色列发动袭击引发。
description.en: An armed conflict that began on 7 October 2023, initiated by an attack on Israel by Hamas.

description.zh-cn: 伊萨克·赫尔佐格担任以色列总统。
description.en: Isaac Herzog serves as the President of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 本雅明·内塔尼亚胡担任以色列总理。
description.en: Benjamin Netanyahu serves as the Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 《以色列独立宣言》的发布标志着以色列国的正式成立。
description.en: The issuance of the Israeli Declaration of Independence marked the formal establishment of the State of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·本-古里安宣告“犹太国家在以色列家园建立，称为以色列国”，宣读了《以色列独立宣言》。
description.en: David Ben-Gurion declared 'the establishment of a Jewish state in Eretz-Israel, to be known as the State of Israel' by reading the Declaration of Independence.

description.zh-cn: 戴维·本-古里安是以色列首任总理。
description.en: David Ben-Gurion was the first Prime Minister of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 锡安主义运动号召流散于全世界的犹太人回归以色列地故土，恢复本民族的生活方式，并最终促成了以色列国的建立。
description.en: The Zionist movement called on Jews dispersed throughout the world to return to their ancestral homeland in the Land of Israel, to restore their national way of life, and ultimately led to the establishment of the State of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 西奥多·赫茨尔发起了锡安主义运动，并于1897年召集了第一次锡安主义代表大会。
description.en: Theodor Herzl initiated the Zionist movement and convened the First Zionist Congress in 1897.

description.zh-cn: 联合国大会181号决议支持在巴勒斯坦托管地推行分治方案，成立一个犹太国家，为以色列的建立提供了国际法理支持。
description.en: UN General Assembly Resolution 181 supported the partition plan for Mandatory Palestine to create a Jewish state, providing international legal support for the establishment of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 联合国大会表决通过了181号决议。
description.en: The United Nations General Assembly voted to pass Resolution 181.

description.zh-cn: 阿拉伯国家联盟不承认联合国分治方案，并坚持反对以色列建国。
description.en: The Arab League did not recognize the UN partition plan and insisted on opposing the establishment of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 以色列建国次日，邻近的阿拉伯国家便集结军队发动第一次中东战争，试图阻止以色列建国。
description.en: The day after Israel's founding, neighboring Arab countries assembled their armies and launched the First Arab-Israeli War in an attempt to prevent the establishment of Israel.

description.zh-cn: 埃及参与了1948年、1956年、1967年和1973年对以色列的战争，直至1979年签署和平条约。
description.en: Egypt participated in wars against Israel in 1948, 1956, 1967, and 1973, until the signing of a peace treaty in 1979.

description.zh-cn: 约旦参与了1948年和1967年对以色列的战争，直至1994年签署和平条约。
description.en: Jordan participated in wars against Israel in 1948 and 1967, until the signing of a peace treaty in 1994.

description.zh-cn: 叙利亚参与了1948年、1967年和1973年对以色列的战争，两国至今仍处于敌对状态。
description.en: Syria participated in wars against Israel in 1948, 1967, and 1973, and the two countries remain in a state of hostility.

description.zh-cn: 以色列在六日战争中获胜，并占领了约旦河西岸、加沙地带、戈兰高地和西奈半岛，极大地扩展了其实际控制领土。
description.en: Israel won the Six-Day War and occupied the West Bank, Gaza Strip, Golan Heights, and Sinai Peninsula, greatly expanding its de facto territory.

description.zh-cn: 自1967年第三次中东战争以来，以色列持续占领约旦河西岸。
description.en: Israel has occupied the West Bank since the Six-Day War in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 以色列在1967年第三次中东战争中占领加沙地带，并于2005年9月单方面撤军并撤离定居点。
description.en: Israel occupied the Gaza Strip in the 1967 Six-Day War and unilaterally disengaged by withdrawing its troops and dismantling settlements in September 2005.

description.zh-cn: 自1967年第三次中东战争以来，以色列持续占领戈兰高地。
description.en: Israel has occupied the Golan Heights since the Six-Day War in 1967.

description.zh-cn: 以色列在1967年第三次中东战争中占领西奈半岛，并根据1979年埃以和平条约于1982年将其归还给埃及。
description.en: Israel occupied the Sinai Peninsula in the 1967 Six-Day War and returned it to Egypt in 1982 as part of the 1979 Egypt-Israel peace treaty.

description.zh-cn: 在1973年第四次中东战争期间，美国向以色列提供了包括F-4战斗机在内的紧急军事援助，帮助其击退了阿拉伯国家的进攻。
description.en: During the 1973 Yom Kippur War, the United States provided emergency military aid to Israel, including F-4 fighter jets, helping it repel the attack by Arab states.

description.zh-cn: 该条约正式结束了以色列与埃及之间的战争状态，使以色列获得了其第一个阿拉伯邻国的承认。
description.en: This treaty formally ended the state of war between Israel and Egypt, leading to Israel's recognition by its first Arab neighbor.

description.zh-cn: 该条约使埃及收回了在1967年战争中失去的西奈半岛。
description.en: This treaty enabled Egypt to regain the Sinai Peninsula, which it had lost in the 1967 war.

description.zh-cn: 作为以色列总理，梅纳赫姆·贝京与埃及总统萨达特共同签署了《以色列-埃及和平条约》。
description.en: As Prime Minister of Israel, Menachem Begin co-signed the Egypt-Israel Peace Treaty with Egyptian President Anwar Sadat.

description.zh-cn: 作为埃及总统，萨达特与以色列总理贝京共同签署了《以色列-埃及和平条约》。
description.en: As President of Egypt, Anwar Sadat co-signed the Egypt-Israel Peace Treaty with Israeli Prime Minister Menachem Begin.

description.zh-cn: 《奥斯陆协议》使以色列与巴勒斯坦解放组织实现了相互承认，并为巴勒斯坦在约旦河西岸和加沙地带的有限自治铺平了道路。
description.en: The Oslo Accords led to mutual recognition between Israel and the PLO and paved the way for limited Palestinian self-governance in the West Bank and Gaza Strip.

description.zh-cn: 《奥斯陆协议》使巴勒斯坦解放组织获得了以色列的承认，并得以在约旦河西岸和加沙地带部分地区建立有限的自治。
description.en: The Oslo Accords led to the PLO being recognized by Israel and allowed for the establishment of limited self-governance in parts of the West Bank and Gaza Strip.

description.zh-cn: 作为以色列总理，伊扎克·拉宾领导了与巴勒斯坦解放组织的谈判并签署了《奥斯陆协议》。
description.en: As Prime Minister of Israel, Yitzhak Rabin led the negotiations with the PLO and signed the Oslo Accords.

description.zh-cn: 以色列极右翼激进分子伊盖尔·阿米尔因反对《奥斯陆协议》，在特拉维夫刺杀了时任总理伊扎克·拉宾。
description.en: Yigal Amir, an Israeli far-right extremist, assassinated Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin in Tel Aviv due to his opposition to the Oslo Accords.

description.zh-cn: 哈马斯对以色列发动了大规模袭击，引发了2023年加沙—以色列冲突。
description.en: Hamas launched a large-scale attack on Israel, triggering the 2023 Israel-Hamas war.
